Subject: Iugu - Time Zone 10min difference
Description:
Hello Team,

Iugu needs to sync with OKTA to use the SSO login option that the EPP provides. Right now, we a having issues with it and when i checked the time zone and time every option we tried didnt sync correctly. only one, that is 10min ahead of us. can we connect and adjust that on the backend this week?

Best regards,
Solution_Comment__c: The time on the epp server was updated during a remote session
